title: 753: MICHAEL SAYLOR REVEALS HOW BITCOIN GOES TO $10 MILLION PER COIN!! MIAMI WILL HAND OUT FREE BTC!!
description:
MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor in a new interview explains to investors how Bitcoin is going to $10 million per BTC.

"Is it good for Bitcoin if JPM, Goldman Sachs & BOA issue $10 trillion of USD stablecoins & start handling BTC & selling it to all their institutional investors? Yeah its good for BTC. Bitcoin’s going to $1 million per coin and then $10 million a coin."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
